attributes.action: 14 to be equal  Age of Sexual Consent for Hetrosexual and Gay Men And Women.
attributes.additional_details: The age of consent in UK is higher than most EU nations. Lots of younger People are 'consenting to sex.' Telling Fibs about their age saying they are older. Causing men and women to be law breakers through no real fault of anyone other than the fibber. The Age of consent was set in 1800's.
